name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cloud Engineer, I bring extensive expertise in **K8s**, **OpenShift**, **Terraform**, **GitOps**, **CI/CD**, and **GitLab** with a solid background in automation, reliability, and monitoring. Over 8 years of experience in full-stack development has equipped me with a keen understanding of deploying scalable, secure infrastructures and creating efficient CI/CD pipelines while ensuring compliance with industry standards. I have successfully leveraged **SUSE Rancher**, **ArgoCD**, and **HashiCorp** solutions to streamline operations and enhance collaboration across teams.
My experience in cloud environments, particularly using **Azure** and **AWS**, allows me to efficiently troubleshoot issues and implement robust, reliable cloud solutions. I am dedicated to maintaining operational excellence and fostering effective communication within teams.
Additionally, I have a proven track record of developing high-performance applications using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and implementing event-driven systems and microservices architecture, particularly in sectors such as healthcare and finance. My commitment to continuous improvement and innovation drives me to integrate advanced technologies and frameworks effectively.
